item1.description:

Corrupting damage is reduced to 50% when triggered by area of effect or periodic damage.

item0.name: Refillable Potion

item2.name: Luden's Tempest
item2.description:
80 Ability Power
6 Magic Penetration
600 Mana
20 Ability Haste
  • Echo: Damaging Abilities deal an additional (100 + 10% Ability Power) magic damage to the target and 3 nearby enemies and grants you 15% Move Speed for 2 seconds (10s cooldown).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Magic Penetration.

item3.name: Tear of the Goddess
item3.description:
240 Mana
  • Focus: Attacks deal an additional 5 physical damage to Minions.
  • Mana Charge: Strike a target with an Ability to consume a charge and gain 3 bonus Mana, up to a maximum of 360 bonus Mana. Bonus Mana doubled if the target is a champion.

    Gain a new Mana Charge every 8 seconds (max 4).

item4.name: Doran's Ring
item4.description:
15 Ability Power

item5.name: Mercury's Treads
item5.description:
25 Magic Resist
45 Move Speed
30% Tenacity
